bibliography:
Life of Plotinus

Porphyre: La Vie de Plotin, 2 vols., Luc Brisson et al.
(eds.), Paris: Vrin, 1982–1992. (Contains Greek text, French
translations, commentary and several studies of particular
subjects).

Porphyre: La Vie de Plotin, 2 vols., Luc Brisson et al.

translations, commentary and several studies of particular
subjects).

[Sent.] Sententiae

Porphyre: Sentences, Greek text, French translation,

has been called the Sententiae above.)

Porphyre: Sentences, Greek text, French translation,
